Package Data

Class DiskSampleDataSet.Disk

java.lang.Object
Data.DiskSampleDataSet.Disk
Enclosing class:
DiskSampleDataSet
public static class DiskSampleDataSet.Disk extends Object
The basic attributes of a set of points randomly distributed across a disk.

  • Method Details

    • vectors

      public List<Datum> vectors(int id)
      Generated numVectors uniformly random vectors in a disk centered at center.
      Parameters:
      id - The id number of the points in this disk. The number should not exceed the number of sets being created.
      Returns:
      A list of generated vectors.
